description: Get the waterproof protection you need, with the stretch that you crave, in the Apollo Stretch Rain Jacket. This rain jacket is complete with dependable weather protection, functional features, and added comfort and mobility from its stretch shell fabric - all at a great value. Pit zips let you vent out excess heat when you're moving quickly, and an adjustable hood easily sizes up or down depending on your hair or hat.
name: Outdoor Research Apollo Stretch Rain Jacket - Mens
